entry.title: Burger King: One Direction, Buzzfeed spurred chicken fries
entry.summary: A few months later, Hirschhorn says there was an even bigger surge when a One Direction member mentioned them.

entry.title: Burger King: One Direction, Buzzfeed spurred chicken fries
entry.summary: Fans of Burger King's chicken fries may have the boy band One Direction and the website Buzzfeed to thank for the return of the skinny fried sticks.

entry.title: Burger King: One Direction, Buzzfeed spurred chicken fries
With first debate, GOP looks to narrow candidate field, set direction for general election
entry.summary: At stake for Republicans: not only picking the candidate to represent them in the general election, but also selecting the direction the party will take as it seeks to regain the White House.

entry.title: One Direction star Zayn Malik calls off engagement
entry.summary: According to E! the former One Direction star and the Little Mix singer have called off their engagement.

entry.title: Social media has helped One Direction keep going ï¿½ but is end near?
entry.summary:
Which direction is 1D headed?

One Direction was big in Britain in 2010 and they are still going strong in the States, where they are in the midst of a stadium tour.

In a rarity for boy bands, One Direction also seems to make controversy work to its advantage.

The music may be improving, but the end of One Direction is in sight.

Social media has helped One Direction keep going i ½ but is end near?

entry.title: Oh no, Louis! 1D fans react to report Tomlinson to be a dad
entry.summary: LONDON (AP) " One Direction fans have reacted with dismay to a report that band member Louis Tomlinson is to become a father.

entry.title: Oh no, Louis! 1D fans react to report Tomlinson to be a dad
entry.summary: FILE - This Nov. 3, 2013 file photo shows One Direction members Louis Tomlinson, left, and Zayn Malik during an event for their film "One Direction: This Is US," in Makuhari, near Tokyo.

entry.title: One Direction fans respond with dismay to report Louis Tomlinson to be a father
Little things: One Direction's Louis Tomlinson quiet on baby gossip
entry.summary: According to reports, the One Direction star is said to be expecting a baby with Briana Jungwirth, a US-based stylist.
